p: In this model, the L/L matrices are constructed first from the three 2D graphs shown in Fig. 9.5 as a typical example to characterise the DNA sequence. Then the eigenvalues are computed from the matrices, and lastly, λ non-N are calculated which is λ non-N = maxeig (maximal eigenvalue) + mineig (minimal eigenvalue), where N = A, G, C. Proceeding in the same way, we obtain Table 9.8 for our sequence ATGAACACTC with the leading eigenvalues tabulated.
